channel.title: Can some 1 make a tut or send me a link on how... (LeScape u said ud write me 1)
channel.description:
....to make it so you need a required amount of kills on a certain npc to weild a wepon
I.E.-kill 20 jungle demons to wear a dragon scim

item.title: Can some 1 make a tut or send me a link on how... (LeScape u said ud write me 1)
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

use tokens, search for tokens, just add another everything it has and add skills, sorry i forgot and went to a friends house, then rename it to do with like “jungledemonkills”, then you can add a sendFrame126 and add a +jungledemonkills, and under process add a

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == #### && jungledemonkills <= 19) {
remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 1);
}

and change the 19 to 1 less then the required, like that would make it require 20, and #### to the item id number required

Read full topic
